- [Release notes](https://github.com/onsi/ginkgo/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/onsi/ginkgo/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/onsi/ginkgo/compare/v2.12.0...v2.12.1)

- dependency-name: github.com/onsi/ginkgo/v2
  dependency-type: direct:production
  update-type: version-update:semver-patch
...

Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>

Merge pull request #1263 from adrianreber/2023-09-11-checkpoint-export

Verify required checkpoint parameters are set

Verify required checkpoint parameters are set

Without this change it was possible to run

  crictl checkpoint CTR-ID

without specifying '--export'. The export parameter is, however,
required as it tell the CRI implementation where to store the checkpoint
archive. This commit adds a check to ensure '--export' is set and not
empty.

Signed-off-by: Adrian Reber <areber@redhat.com>

Merge pull request #1250 from surik/deprecated-funcs-cleanup

Cleanup deprecations
Remove duplicated import "k8s.io/cri-api/pkg/apis"

Enable staticcheck linter with SA1019 to find deprecated methods

SA1019 - Using a deprecated function, variable, constant or field

See https://staticcheck.dev/docs/checks/#SA1019
Use executor.StreamWithContext instead of deprecated executor.Stream

Address deprecation of Strings.Title

By using golang.org/x/text/cases

Remove unnecessary rand.Seed

As of Golang 1.20 this is not needed anymore.
The math/rand package now automatically seeds the global random number generator
Address deprecated io/ioutils
Address deprecated call cli.NewExitError of urfave/cli package

Merge pull request #1243 from saschagrunert/incu

Remove the Kubernetes incubator reference from README.md

Remove the Kubernetes incubator reference from README.md

The project is pretty much in stable mode now, I guess we do not require
the reference to "Kubernetes Incubator" any more.

The term is also deprecated per:
https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/archive/incubator.md

Signed-off-by: Sascha Grunert <sgrunert@redhat.com>

Merge pull request #1239 from saschagrunert/release-notes-script

Use previous and latest tag from git in release script

Bump latest version in README.md

Signed-off-by: Sascha Grunert <sgrunert@redhat.com>

Use previous and latest tag from git in release script

We cannot rely on the discover modes of the release notes tool, because
we cut patch releases from time to time from `master`. Means we now
simply select the latest and previous tag from the git command.

Signed-off-by: Sascha Grunert <sgrunert@redhat.com>

Merge pull request #1236 from saschagrunert/seccomp-filter

Fix seccomp value in test

Fix seccomp value in test

The seccomp value should be `2` rather than `1`. The test succeeded
because we also have the value `Seccomp_filters` which gets matched by
"ecc", too. We now check for "Seccomp:" to actually match the right
field.

Signed-off-by: Sascha Grunert <sgrunert@redhat.com>

Merge pull request #1224 from saschagrunert/security-context

Use `UserSpecifiedImage` for seccomp tests

The seccomp tests use their own container creation logic, which is why
we forgot to add the `UserSpecifiedImage` there as well. This is now
fixed.

Signed-off-by: Sascha Grunert <sgrunert@redhat.com>

Merge pull request #1219 from saschagrunert/glog

Switch to logrus in favor of glog

Switch to logrus in favor of glog

Using a single logging framework should be enough for the project,
therefore we now use logrus in favor of the glog package.

Use google/uuid

This fixes the double generation as well as simplifies the code and
vendored dependencies.

Signed-off-by: Sascha Grunert <sgrunert@redhat.com>

Fix release notes job

- Fix binary download if build dir does not exist
- Allow gathering of dependencies
- Update CI machine to `ubuntu-latest`
- Use `patch-to-patch` discovery mode to include patch releases

Signed-off-by: Sascha Grunert <sgrunert@redhat.com>

Merge pull request #1216 from saschagrunert/docker-logs

Drop support for docker log format

Drop support for docker log format

Dockershim has been removed from Kubernetes so we only need to support
the CRI log format.

Signed-off-by: Sascha Grunert <sgrunert@redhat.com>
